mbean.name: SipStandardManager
mbean.description: Standard implementation of the SipManager interface

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.description: The message digest algorithm to be used when generating session identifiers

attribute.name: randomFile
attribute.description: File source of random - /dev/urandom or a pipe

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: distributable
attribute.description: The distributable flag for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: entropy
attribute.description: A String initialization parameter used to increase the entropy of the initialization of our random number generator

attribute.name: maxActiveSessions
attribute.description: The maximum number of active Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

attribute.name: maxInactiveInterval
attribute.description: The default maximum inactive interval for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: maxActiveSipSessions
attribute.description: The maximum number of active Sip Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

attribute.name: maxActiveSipApplicationSessions
attribute.description: The maximum number of active sip Application Sessions allowed, or -1 for no limit

attribute.name: maxInactiveInterval
attribute.description: The default maximum inactive interval for Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: processExpiresFrequency
attribute.description: The frequency of the manager checks (expiration and passivation)

attribute.name: sessionIdLength
attribute.description: The session id length (in bytes) of Sessions created by this Manager

attribute.name: name
attribute.description: The descriptive name of this Manager implementation (for logging)

attribute.name: pathname
attribute.description: Path name of the disk file in which active sessions

attribute.name: activeSessions
attribute.description: Number of active sessions at this moment

attribute.name: activeSipSessions
attribute.description: Number of active sip sessions at this moment

attribute.name: activeSipApplicationSessions
attribute.description: Number of active sip application sessions at this moment

attribute.name: sessionCounter
attribute.description: Total number of sessions created by this manager

attribute.name: sipSessionCounter
attribute.description: Total number of sip sessions created by this manager

attribute.name: sipApplicationSessionCounter
attribute.description: Total number of sip application sessions created by this manager

attribute.name: maxActive
attribute.description: Maximum number of active sessions so far

attribute.name: maxActiveSipSessions
attribute.description: Maximum number of active sip sessions so far

attribute.name: maxActiveSipApplicationSessions
attribute.description: Maximum number of active sip application sessions so far

attribute.name: sessionMaxAliveTime
attribute.description: Longest time an expired session had been alive

attribute.name: sipSessionMaxAliveTime
attribute.description: Longest time an expired sip session had been alive

attribute.name: sipApplicationSessionMaxAliveTime
attribute.description: Longest time an expired sip application session had been alive

attribute.name: sessionAverageAliveTime
attribute.description: Average time an expired session had been alive

attribute.name: sipSessionAverageAliveTime
attribute.description: Average time an expired sip session had been alive

attribute.name: sipApplicationSessionAverageAliveTime
attribute.description: Average time an expired sip application session had been alive

attribute.name: rejectedSessions
attribute.description: Number of sessions we rejected due to maxActive beeing reached

attribute.name: rejectedSipSessions
attribute.description: Number of sip sessions we rejected due to maxActive beeing reached

attribute.name: rejectedSipApplicationSessions
attribute.description: Number of sip application sessions we rejected due to maxActive beeing reached

attribute.name: expiredSessions
attribute.description: Number of sessions that expired ( doesn't include explicit invalidations )

attribute.name: expiredSipSessions
attribute.description: Number of sip sessions that expired ( doesn't include explicit invalidations )

attribute.name: expiredSipApplicationSessions
attribute.description: Number of sip application sessions that expired ( doesn't include explicit invalidations )

attribute.name: numberOfSipSessionCreationPerSecond
attribute.description: Number of sip sessions created per second

attribute.name: numberOfSipApplicationSessionCreationPerSecond
attribute.description: Number of sip application sessions created per second

attribute.name: processingTime
attribute.description: Time spent doing housekeeping and expiration

attribute.name: duplicates
attribute.description: Number of duplicated session ids generated

operation.name: listSessionIds
operation.description: Return the list of active session ids

operation.name: listSipSessionIds
operation.description: Return the list of active session ids

operation.name: listSipApplicationSessionIds
operation.description: Return the list of active session ids
